label:
This is an in-app notification that is sent to the subscribers of an event post if the event was updated.

You can insert the following dynamic values:

##ActivityTitle## - Title of event
##NotifierFullName## - Name of the subscriber receiving the notification
##FullName## - Name of the creator of the event

template.message: Dear ##NotifierFullName##, the event you subscribed to: ##ActivityTitle## has been updated, please check the event page for further information
